episodes.title: REEL Answers: Holy Hell Director ethical dilemmas filming a cult. Filmmaking Advice from directors.
episodes.description:
"We're a tribal people - we seek community" says Holy Hell director Allen Will on why cults are common. Even "the word culture has the word cult in it."

Subscribe to @TheFilmSalesCompany to watch the feature documentary HOLY HELL for free and see more REEL Answers filmmakers Q&As

episodes.title: Holy Hell | FULL Cult Documentary | Free
episodes.description:
After graduating from college, young idealist Will Allen joined a spiritual community filled with like minded people looking for some answers to the basic questions of life, led by a charismatic but secretive guru.  Camera in hand, Allen documented 20 years of living inside this community, showing how his idealism began to unravel as more is revealed about the true nature of this cult. Speaking out publicly for the first time, and with unprecedented and unparalleled access, Holy Hell is a descent into a world no one, not even its participants, could have imagined.
#independentfilm #documentarymovies #sundance #sundancefilmfestival #escaping #cult #cults

episodes.title: Blessed Child/Cults. Subs in 한국어, हिन्दी, 日本語, français, espagnol and other languages. Documentary
episodes.description:
She grew up in a cult-The Unification  Church A/K/A MOONIES. She was married in a stadium in Seoul Korea to a man she had never met because Reverend Moon told her to do so. Who Needs Tinder or Hinge if you can have an arranged marriage? One day she left the Church. Her parents stayed. Now she has made a movie about her experience. You won't believe your eyes. BLESSED CHILD is one daughter’s attempt to unpack the legacy of the decisions her parents made while challenging assumptions - hers and ours - about cults and family.

🇺🇦 [Українська]
Цей фільм доступний з українськими субтитрами.

🇵🇰 [اردو]
یہ فلم اردو ذیلی عنوانات کے ساتھ دستیاب ہے۔

🇲🇾 [Bahasa Melayu]
Filem ini tersedia dengan sari kata Bahasa Melayu.

🇮🇳 [తెలుగు]
ఈ సినిమా తెలుగు సబ్‌టైటిల్స్‌తో అందుబాటులో ఉంది.

🇵🇭 [Filipino]
Ang pelikulang ito ay may mga subtitle sa Filipino.

🇸🇪 [Svenska]
Denna film finns tillgänglig med svenska undertexter.

 



Director: Cara Jones

episodes.title: Reel Answers/Blessed Child/Documentary film about Moonies Cult, now with Korean Subtitles
episodes.description: Meet the director Cara Jones as she discusses with Andrew Herwitz how she was able to make a film about her family who is still in the Unification Church, ie the Moonies Cult.

episodes.title: Blessed Child REEL ANSWERS  with Andrew Herwitz| /Documentary- She Left the CULT that Raised her
episodes.description:
The Film Sales Company President, Andrew Herwitz, talks with Director Cara Jones.
